/newgame - Create new game
/join - Join game
/leave - Leave game

/language - Change language
commands.title: 🤖 Bot Commands

hand_rankings.title: 🏆 Hand Rankings (Best to Worst)

rules.actions:
**Actions:**
• Check: Pass action
• Call: Match current bet
• Raise: Increase bet
• Fold: Forfeit hand
• All-In: Bet all chips
rules.betting_rounds:
**Betting Rounds:**
1️⃣ Pre-flop (2 cards dealt)
2️⃣ Flop (3 community cards)
3️⃣ Turn (1 community card)
4️⃣ River (1 community card)
rules.objective: **Objective:** Make the best 5-card hand from your 2 cards + 5 community cards.
rules.title: 📖 Texas Hold'em Rules

help.full_text:
🎴 Texas Hold’em Poker Bot

📖 How to Play:
• Use /start to open the main menu
• Use /private to create or join private games
• Use /help to see this message
• Use /language to change your language

🎮 Game Rules:
• 2-10 players per game
• Standard Texas Hold’em rules
• Betting rounds: Pre-flop, Flop, Turn, River

💰 Actions:
• Fold - Give up your hand
• Check - Pass without betting
• Call - Match current bet
• Raise - Increase the bet
• All-in - Bet everything

🏆 Hand Rankings (High to Low):
1. Royal Flush
2. Straight Flush
3. Four of a Kind
4. Full House
5. Flush
6. Straight
7. Three of a Kind
8. Two Pair
9. One Pair
10. High Card

Good luck! 🍀
